ud5.8:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava rajagahe viharati veluvane kalandakanivape.
ud5.8:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena ayasma anando tadahuposathe pubbanhasamayam nivasetva pattacivaramadaya rajagaham pindaya pavisi.
ud5.8:2.1: Addasa kho devadatto ayasmantam anandam rajagahe pindaya carantam.
ud5.8:2.2: Disvana yenayasma anando tenupasankami; upasankamitva ayasmantam anandam etadavoca:
ud5.8:2.3: “ajjatagge danaham, avuso ananda, annatreva bhagavata annatra bhikkhusangha uposatham karissami sanghakammani ca”ti.
ud5.8:3.1: Atha kho ayasma anando rajagahe pindaya caritva pacchabhattam pindapatapatikkanto yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi.
ud5.8:3.2: Ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma anando bhagavantam etadavoca:
ud5.8:4.1: “Idhaham, bhante, pubbanhasamayam nivasetva pattacivaramadaya rajagaham pindaya pavisim.
ud5.8:4.2: Addasa kho mam, bhante, devadatto rajagahe pindaya carantam.
ud5.8:4.3: Disvana yenaham tenupasankami; upasankamitva mam etadavoca:
ud5.8:4.4: ‘ajjatagge danaham, avuso ananda, annatreva bhagavata annatra bhikkhusangha uposatham karissami sanghakammani ca’ti.
ud5.8:4.5: Ajja, bhante, devadatto sangham bhindissati, uposathanca karissati sanghakammani ca”ti.
ud5.8:5.1: Atha kho bhagava etamattham viditva tayam velayam imam udanam udanesi:
